attributes.action: encourage British comic Bill Bailey to represent the United Kingdom in the 2008 Eurovision Song Contest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the massive amount of interest surrounding a section of a social networking internet site dedicated to this cause, we believe that Bill Bailey must represent the United Kingdom in the 2008 Eurovision Song Contest.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
